name: Buggy
text: On Play: Return up to one of your opponents characters to the bottom of the deck, then if you do not control 5 characters with a cost of 5 or more, return this character to the bottom of the deck.

effect.text: Return up to one of your opponents characters to the bottom of the deck, then if you do not control 5 characters with a cost of 5 or more, return this character to the bottom of the deck.

meta.notes: Card marked as SAMPLE, so stats may not reflect final version. Power value is 12000 as printed.
